actions.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 946.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Point of order that the bill violates section 311 of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 raised in Senate.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to the bill rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 54-44. Record Vote No: 262.
Ruled out of order by the chair.
Amendments SP 2941 and SP 2942 fell when the bill was ruled out of order.
Returned to the Calendar. Calendar No. 946.

official_title: A bill to cut Social Security contribution rates and return Social Security to pay-as-you-go financing, and for other purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to revise social security tax rates to provide for reduced rates until 2015 and increased rates beginning in 2020. Increases the OASDI contribution and benefit base on a graduated basis from 1990 to 1996.

titles.title: A bill to cut Social Security contribution rates and return Social Security to pay-as-you-go financing, and for other purposes.
